404.title: 404 Page Not Found
404.subtext_html: The page you requested does not exist. Click here to continue shopping.

password_page.admin_link_html: Are you the store owner? Log in here
password_page.powered_by_shopify_html: This shop will be powered by {{ Lapine }}

search.no_results_html: Your search for "{{ terms }}" did not yield any results.

comments.title: Leave a comment
comments.name: Name

comments.success: Your comment was posted successfully! Thank you!

label.add_note: Add a note to your order

general.title: Collections
general.no_matches: There are no products available in this collection.  Contact your ASM for additional products.

form.name: Name
form.post_success: “ Thank you ! Invitation to create account and password to follow. “

activate_account.title: Activate Account
activate_account.subtext: Create your password to activate your account.

addresses.title: Your Addresses
addresses.delete_confirm: Are you sure you wish to delete this address?

recover_password.title: Reset your password
recover_password.subtext: We will send you an email to reset your password.
recover_password.success: We've sent you an email with a link to update your password.

reset_password.title: Reset account password
reset_password.subtext: Enter a new password for {{ email }}

issued.title: Here's your {{ value }} gift card for {{ shop }}!
issued.redeem: Use this code at checkout to redeem your gift card

thank_you.delivered_description_html: Your shipment has been delivered to the address you provided. If you haven't received it, or if you have any other problems, please {{ contact_us }}.
thank_you.failed_contact_merchant: According to {{ company }}, your order couldn't be delivered as planned. Please contact {{ company }} to arrange another delivery attempt.
thank_you.failed_contact_merchant_no_company: Your order couldn't be delivered as planned. Please contact us to arrange another delivery attempt.
thank_you.title: Thank you for your order!
thank_you.thank_you_description_html: We have your order and we are getting it ready.  If further information or adjustments are needed, we will contact you.
thank_you.thank_you_description: We have your order and we are getting it ready.

order_covered_by_gift_cards_notice.one: Your order is covered by your gift card.
order_covered_by_gift_cards_notice.other: Your order is covered by your gift cards.

card_fields_unavailable_html.other:
Credit and Debit card payments aren't available right now.
Please refresh this page or try a different payment method.

payment.free_order_notice_html: Your order (including shipping, if applicable) will be charged to the Payment Code entered
payment.title: Payment Code

field_errors.reduction_code_code_not_found: This code did not match any active gift card or discount. Was it entered correctly? ( You can find your paymenty code on the homepage, in the dropdown list beneath "Other" )

shipping.waiting_on_rate_notice: Please wait while shipping rates are being calculated
shipping.no_rates_for_cart_or_destination_notice: Unable to calculate shipping- confirm state/zip ode are correct, and that address is not a PO box.

payment_summary.free_label: Your order value (including shipping) will be charged to the Payment Code entered.

errors.discount_not_found: Unable to find a valid payment code matching the code entered ( You can find your paymenty code on the homepage, in the dropdown list beneath "Other" )
errors.discount_disabled: This payment code has been disabled

consistent_cart_addon.merge_cart_text: It seems you already have a cart from a previous session. Would you like to merge your previous cart with your current cart?
